price: Àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ àyò ní ọjọ́ yẹn, apá kan wọn yóò jẹ́ ọ̀tá fún apá kan àyàfi àwọn olùbẹ̀rù (Allāhu).
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
